intension: Create a festive Instagram Story for the Christmas holiday season featuring a shiny red Christmas bauble and a quote by Phyllis Diller. The quote reads 'Christmas is a time when everyone wants his past forgotten and his present remembered'. The design should include the hashtag #hellochristmas and the Instagram handle @IST.
globalcaption: The image features a red ornament, possibly a Christmas ball, hanging in the air. The ornament is surrounded by a snowy background, giving it a festive appearance. The ornament is positioned in the center of the image, and it appears to be the main focus of the scene.
keywords: bright, celebration, christmas, fair, festive, holiday, lights, merry, new year, night, party, season, winter, xmas, red, glitter, bauble, ball, hellochristmas, story, instagram, ig, insta, quote
